doc.summary: All elements from this class are prefixed with a special prefix.
doc.text:
All elements from this class are prefixed with a special prefix. This way you can keep field names simple
and avoid duplicates.

doc.summary: Can be applied to a class to register all public static final fields to a ModXRegistration.
doc.text:
Can be applied to a class to register all public static final fields to a ModXRegistration.

To ignore a field add @NoReg to it.

By default the name from the field is taken and translated to snake case. To explicitly set a name use
@RegName.
